settings.text: At Brewster Village Marketplace, we're more than just a neighborhood store — we're a part of the community.

For generations, our charming corner of Brewster has served as a trusted stop for locals and visitors alike. From everyday essentials to special moments shared over a bottle of wine or a handcrafted deli sandwich, we're proud to be woven into the fabric of daily life in our town.

Our marketplace is a reflection of what we value most: quality, care, and connection. We offer a thoughtfully curated selection of local groceries, craft beer, fine wine, artisanal deli items, and more — each chosen to meet the tastes and needs of our community.

Walk through our doors and you'll find not only top-shelf products, but also warm conversations, friendly faces, and a genuine love for service. Whether you're grabbing your weekly staples, discovering something new, or just in the mood for something delicious — you'll always feel welcome here.
Rooted in tradition, guided by quality, and built with pride, Brewster Village Marketplace continues to sail forward — just like the ship on our sign — with purpose, heart, and hospitality.
We invite you to stop by. Stay a while. And shop like a neighbor.
